attributes.action: ...exempt vehicles over 12 years old from qualifying for any future "scrappage" discount on the price of a new car.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rumour has it that a scheme to bolster new car sales will be introduced involving a grant when an old car is scrapped.  This will kill off the classic cars of the future and needlessly waste perfectly good manufactured goods whose emissions in use are far outweighed by those generated building new ones.  Please, limit any grant to 6-12 year old vehicles and not condemn well-kept older vehicles to the scrap pile.
